text: Étienne Tshisekedi wa Mulumba (14 December 1921 - 1 February 2017) was a Congolese politician. He was the leader of the Union for Democracy and Social Progress (UDPS). He served as the Prime Minister of Zaire three times: in 1991, 1992-1993 and 1997. He was born in Kabeya Kamwanga, Belgian Congo. Tshisekedi died from a pulmonary embolism on 1 February 2017 in Brussels, Belgium at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pulmonary embolism Category:Disease-related deaths in Belgium Category:Prime ministers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: Étienne Tshisekedi
